about_the_game:
Looking for a game that allows you to explore limitless life's possibilities? Look no further than Life Changer, the exciting life simulation RPG available on both Windows and Mac OS. Whether you choose to challenge your friends locally or embark on a journey of personal growth and success, you'll have the opportunity to acquire skills, education, advance your career, make sound financial decisions, and invest in a range of assets to help you achieve your life goals, grow your businesses and achieve financial stability. Play today and discover the key to lasting happiness and fulfillment.

The journey to achieve your dreams starts now! Experience the life you've always imagined!

Features:
  • Choose to play as a single player or multiplayer game with the option to challenge your friends or play against the computer, available on both Windows and Mac OS.
  • Dive into the full depth of the game with RPG-inspired gameplay, featuring character growth and exploration.
  • Experience the game in many different ways as you develop the best and most efficient strategy to achieve all of your goals.
  • Invest in a variety of items, each with unique benefits, including clothing, electronics, vehicles, homes and businesses
  • Experience dynamic living costs realism of a life simulation game with an inflation and deflation model.
  • Increase your game happiness with activities like going on a scenic trip, watching a movie, attending a concert, shopping, and fine dining.
  • Advance your education from Middle School to Bachelor's Degree and beyond, eventually completing your doctorate!
  • Advance your career to achieve financial stability and potentially progress from a janitor to a CEO of a large company.
  • Grow your businesses with options like research, marketing, renovations, meeting the community, and expanding your business.
  • Design the life you've always wanted with abundant options and possibilities.

    Official Website:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 64 bit
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

name: Life Changer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.5GHZ +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 or 11
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Life Changer is a Windows & Mac OS life simulation RPG that allows you to compete with friends or embark on a life quest of personal growth. Acquire skills, education, assets, advance career, invest & grow businesses to achieve life goals & live the life of your dreams in this life changing game.
